title: How to Install OpenArena on a Mac

steps.headline: Go to the website and download the file here.
Copy and paste OpenArena 0.8.8 r28 in to the Applications folder.
steps.description: This may require the admin password.

steps.headline: Copy and paste the following in the terminal: sudo chmod +x /Applications/OpenArena\ 0.8.8\ r28.app/Contents/MacOS/openarena.ub
Press enter and exit the terminal.
Go to Applications and open OpenArena.

text: Go to the website and download the file here.  Open and unzip the file.  Copy and paste OpenArena 0.8.8 r28 in to the Applications folder. This may require the admin password. Open a Terminal Window.  Copy and paste the following in the terminal: sudo chmod +x /Applications/OpenArena\ 0.8.8\ r28.app/Contents/MacOS/openarena.ub  Press enter and exit the terminal.  Go to Applications and open OpenArena.
